title: RT News - October 26, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: Russian gun rights activist Maria Butina arrives in Moscow, after serving most of an 18-month prison sentence in the US for unregistered lobbying activities. She spoke to us here in the RT studio. 'International state racketeering' - Russia's defense ministry bitterly criticises the US over its decision to send troops to secure north-eastern Syria's oil fields. No respite for Chile - as the country enters into a second week of protests over 'inequality'. A million people marched through the country's capital on Friday.
description: Russian gun rights activist Maria Butina arrives in Moscow, after serving most of an 18-month prison sentence in the US for unregistered lobbying activities
